content.text:
# Draft:Battle of Diyala (1822)

The Battle of Diyala was a military engagement fought between the Shammar tribe and Qajar Iran. The battle occurred due to overlapping claims on the city of Baghdad between the two powers.
| date              = 1822
| result            = Shammari victory
| combatant1        =  Shammar tribe
| combatant2        =  Qajar Iran
| commander1        =  Ibn Faris Al-Jarba
| commander2        =  Fath Ali Shah
| strength1         = 800
| strength2         = 40,000
}}
